direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve modifying loan-related parameters (LTV in loanAdjustLTV and repayment in loanRepay) with similar control flows and parameter handling.
Both methods involve loan operations (adjusting LTV in loanAdjustLTV and borrowing in loanBorrow) with similar parameter structures and control flows.
Both methods adjust LTV for loans but differ in the type of loan (flexible vs. standard). The test cases for one can be adapted for the other.
Both methods involve adjusting loan parameters (LTV in loanAdjustLTV and margin call in customizeMarginCall) that affect the loan's collateral and risk management.
Both methods depend on collateral details (LTV adjustment in loanAdjustLTV and collateral repayment rate in collateralRepayRate), suggesting shared underlying dependencies.
